Extensive SAT
Content

Our customized program draws from a collection of more than 100 hours of lessons and 7100+ realistic practice questions. This large collection of high quality content created by our top instructors ensures that you're always getting fresh, extensive practice for the real SAT.

Our SAT product covers all three SAT subsections (Reading, Writing and Language, and Math), plus the essay. We also include ten official SATs to test your skills.

Prepare with the largest lesson bank.

A Little Bit About Our Approach

We realize that a big part of the SAT for many students is motivation to study and confidence about their performance. Our program gives students problems geared towards their level, so they never feel like studying is overwhelming. Our program also sends students personalized encouragement on progress. Finally, PrepScholar breaks down each part of the SAT to help them gain confidence.

Learn Strategies

Are you a smart student, but can't figure out why you're scoring low on the SAT?

One of the main reasons is that the SAT requires thinking in specific ways that you're not used to and never learned in school. You can definitely master these methods, but it takes training and an awareness of strategy.

We teach you how to think correctly about the SAT.
